data.title: Roboflow Changelog: August 2021
data.description: Each month we share a recap of our monthly updates and releases in the Roboflow Changelog. The previous Changelog is available here. In July, the product team's major emphasis was on a new product we'll be releasing at our Launch Party on Wednesday, August 11; hope to see you there

data.title: Using Computer Vision to Accelerate Microbiology Research and Combat Antibiotic Resistance
data.description: Michael Shamash is a Master’s student in the Maurice Lab at Canada's McGill University. Michael used Roboflow to streamline the production of a model and iOS app for use in microbiology.

data.description: Updated September 2021 (v0.2.0): MediaSearch Finder now supports optional user authentication and support for Amazon Kendra OpenID token based access control.
